Bringing Together Talented Artists

Our mission is to showcase the Collaboration of Talents between musicians, camera operators, and audio engineers through rich visual media and production-quality live sound recordings.

Through performances and interviews we explore the Artists’ individual paths as well as the Universal Truths that drive their artistic expression.

Going Behind the Performance

Our artist interviews focus on the participation that takes place on and off the screen. At times you may see our Producer perform, or even our Sound Engineer.

So sit back, grab a pair of your favorite headphones, and play back one of our spirited performances.

Let The Musical Conversation be your own private concert.

Artist Showcase

Hutchinson

Our most recent jam session features Hutchinson, performing at The Musician's Choice Studios in Culver City.

Hutchison is composed of

  • Daniel Sunshine - Percussion
  • Talia Arnold – Guitar & Vocals
  • Joseph Watson – Guitar
  • Arthur Walton – Guitar
  • Paul Cline – Guitar

About The Musical Conversation

Background

The Musical Conversation features up and coming artists from Los Angeles and beyond. Remember, you heard them here first!

Follow our YouTube channel and stay tuned for what we have in store.
